text: Ara musara jan'ya amara trisa ratera oyada kari [1] ebam aro dasa diye ta purna kari. Ebhabe tara rabera nirdharita samaya callisa rate [2] purna haya. Ebam musa tara bha'i harunake balalena, â€˜amara anupasthitite amara sampradayera madhye apani amara pratinidhitba karabena, sansodhana karabena ara biparyaya srstikaridera patha anusarana karabena na [3].â€™
